Traits.Name: Overdrive 3
Traits.Description: Deals boosted damage if the current round is 3 or higher.

Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Traits.Name: Acid Splash
Traits.Description: Attacks deal piercing fray magic damage on hit or miss to all foes in range 2 of the target as an area effect.

Traits.Name: Insulated
Traits.Description: Ignores dangerous terrain, difficult terrain, and terrain effects.

Actions.Name: Spray
Actions.Hit: Deal piercing fray damage and inflict blight.

Actions.Name: Sticky Solution
Actions.Description: Area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: Flash
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 must save or take fray magic damage and be blighted.
